Text:
I facking hate xmas 
it should be against the law to mix sci fi and the unholy faggotry that is xmas
@nsofast: What's wrong? Dislike a little bit of Fantasy mixed in with your Sci-Fi?

@tmcmahon51
I think you nailed it for me 
I do hate that facking crap
Keep the cackadoodie jebus out of my sci fi
makes me feel puddi

Your inability to enjoy something over-commercialized but still pure in essence sickens me nsofast. It should be "against the law" for people who obviously cannot find a single iota of joy during a pleasant holiday because it is mixed with something that was made, obviously, ONLY FOR YOU!!

Don't make some opinionated statement and make it sound like fact, either think about what  and how your typing or DON'T WATCH THE SHOW!!!
